title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
text: Learning the concept of Inline and Block Elements in HTML is very important.

title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
text: Inline elements are those which are required to take the width of the screen.

title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
text: And Block Elements are those which take the entire width of the screen.

title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
text: It is also called Display Property which can be set through CSS.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: In this video, we will see how CSS is added to an HTML page.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: CSS has three ways to add to HTML.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: The first is inline CSS, which is used for style attributes and is added to HTML pages.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: The second way is internal CSS.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: Internal CSS means tag a style and put it in the HTML page style tag.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: The most used is external CSS.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: Make a .css file and put all your styles in it.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: I will tell you the difference in the video in detail.

title: Inline, Internal & External CSS
text: When and when to use it.
